comment: hey bro I have a similar recipe to your brew (https://www.brewtoad.com/recipes/jrob-s-pacifico) - it's my interpretation of Pacifico Clara - I gather a lot from this recipe on White Laps (http://www.whitelabs.com/recipes/pilsner-lager/amigo-mexican-lager) - I just noticed we both used Amarillo hops :)
